txt.en: \qThe Verses of the North\q is said to be a record of some of the musical traditions of the Lossoth of Forochel, detailing the songs they sing as they enter battle.

You have heard it whispered that the libraries of Moria yet contain many tomes, while many other volumes were brought by the dwarves seeking to reclaim their ancient realm. One such tome in the libraries of the Iron Garrison is said to be the legendary \qThe Verses of the North.\q If you can gain enough favour with the Iron Garrison Guards, they may let you have their copy of this book.
Read the book, \qThe Verses of the North\q
